                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-lindsay-shuts-down-lauer-minutes-before-interview"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Lindsay Shuts Down Matt Lauer Minutes Before Interview">Lindsay Shuts Down Matt Lauer Minutes Before Interview</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/tv-news/" title="View all posts in TV News" rel="category tag">TV News</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/lindsay-lohan/" title="View all posts in Lindsay Lohan" rel="category tag">Lindsay Lohan</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image171662" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/lindsshutsdownlauer.jpg" alt="Linds Shuts Down Lauer" /></p>
<p><strong>Matt Lauer</strong> is a busy dude, so when he flies all the way out to El Lay from NYC, you'd think you'd know why he was coming and what you've agreed to before he gets here!</p>
<p>He came out to interview <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/lindsay-lohan/" target="_blank"><strong>Lindsay Lohan</strong></a>, made it all the way into her house, set up, and they were both going through make up when Lindsay was reminded that it might be a lengthy interview &#8212; which then she promptly refused to do.</p>
<p>See, Lindsay though it was only going to be a 15 minute interview. But  <a href="#readmore" id="more-popup-link-171656" onclick="perez_openPopUpPost('171656', 'http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-lindsay-shuts-down-lauer-minutes-before-interview')">Read the rest of this entry &raquo;</a>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">WENN</a></em>.]</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-lindsay-shuts-down-lauer-minutes-before-interview"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Lindsay Shuts Down Matt Lauer Minutes Before Interview">Permalink</a>

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-anderson-cooper-calls-out-obama-on-gay-marriage-flip-flop"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Anderson Cooper Calls Out Obama On Gay Marriage Flip Flop">Anderson Cooper Calls Out Obama On Gay Marriage Flip Flop</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/gay-gay-gay/" title="View all posts in Gay Gay Gay" rel="category tag">Gay Gay Gay</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/politik/" title="View all posts in Politik" rel="category tag">Politik</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/barack-obama/" title="View all posts in Barack Obama" rel="category tag">Barack Obama</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/anderson-cooper/" title="View all posts in Anderson Cooper" rel="category tag">Anderson Cooper</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" name="embedded_player_fda12c8fbbfec" width="410" height="308" data="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=fda12c8fbbfec&p=vega4-openx-pre-roll-flp" id="embedded_player_fda12c8fbbfec"><param name="movie" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=fda12c8fbbfec&p=vega4-openx-pre-roll-flp"/><param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"/><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"/><param name="base" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com"/><param name="wmode" value="transparent"/><param name="bgcolor" value="#000000"/><param name="flashvars" value="v=fda12c8fbbfec&autoplay=false"/></object></p>
<p>And rightly so. It's sometimes bizarre how the Silver Fox ends up saying things that we're all thinking!</p>
<p><a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/anderson-cooper/" target="_blank"><strong>Anderson Cooper</strong></a> took some time on his show recently to talk to a few people about <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/barack-obama/" target="_blank"><strong>Obama</strong></a>'s apparent flip flopping on the issues of gay marriage, and how it's obviously more politically motivated than it is personal. </p>
<p>He brings up a good point about Obama's claim that <a href="#readmore" id="more-popup-link-171588" onclick="perez_openPopUpPost('171588', 'http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-anderson-cooper-calls-out-obama-on-gay-marriage-flip-flop')">Read the rest of this entry &raquo;</a>
</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-anderson-cooper-calls-out-obama-on-gay-marriage-flip-flop"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Anderson Cooper Calls Out Obama On Gay Marriage Flip Flop">Permalink</a>
                                                       / <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-anderson-cooper-calls-out-obama-on-gay-marriage-flip-flop#respond" title="Comment on Anderson Cooper Calls Out Obama On Gay Marriage Flip Flop">1 comment</a>

                <div>
                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-brad-pitt-angelina-jolie-planning-secret-france-wedding-september"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Is Brangelina Planning To Get Hitched???">Is Brangelina Planning To Get Hitched???</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/brad-pitt/" title="View all posts in Brad Pitt" rel="category tag">Brad Pitt</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/angelina-jolie/" title="View all posts in Angelina Jolie" rel="category tag">Angelina Jolie</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image171587" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/brangelina-cover__oPt.jpg" alt="brangelina-cover.jpg" /></p>
<p>So says <em>In Touch Weekly</em>, so &#8230; a grain of salt, if you please!</p>
<p>According to sources, <a href="http://www.perezhilton.com/category/Brad-Pitt/" target="_blank"><strong>Brad Pitt</strong></a> and <a href="http://www.perezhilton.com/category/Angelina-Jolie/" target="_blank"><strong>Angelina Jolie</strong></a> are planning to finally "make it official" and get married at their French chateau this September. Reportedly, the power couple are ready to become man and wife for the sake of their kids, who desperately want to see it happen. The "intimate ceremony" will be attended by only the couple's closest of friends. Angelina will supposedly be wearing a custom-created Lâ€™Wren Scott gown and her assistant, <strong>Holly Goline</strong>, will act as her maid of honor. The source further claims that her brother <strong>James Haven</strong> will officiate the ceremony.</p>
<p>Wowza! Sounds like they've got a lot of their bases already covered &#8230; if this is true. Personally, we have our doubts that these two will ever get married. We don't think they see the need really. They're already a family and they've already proven they love each other. What's a wedding going to do for them???
</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-brad-pitt-angelina-jolie-planning-secret-france-wedding-september"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Is Brangelina Planning To Get Hitched???">Permalink</a>

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-x-factor-usa-upfront-footage-includes-cheryl-cole"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to The X Factor Upfront Footage WITH Chezza Hits The Web!">The <em>X Factor</em> Upfront Footage WITH Chezza Hits The Web!</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/icky-icky-poo/" title="View all posts in Icky Icky Poo" rel="category tag">Icky Icky Poo</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/tv-news/" title="View all posts in TV News" rel="category tag">TV News</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/paula-abdul/" title="View all posts in Paula Abdul" rel="category tag">Paula Abdul</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/simon-cowell/" title="View all posts in Simon Cowell" rel="category tag">Simon Cowell</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/cheryl-cole/" title="View all posts in Cheryl Cole" rel="category tag">Cheryl Cole</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/x-factor/" title="View all posts in X Factor" rel="category tag">X Factor</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" name="embedded_player_1a24a12e8ff80" width="410" height="308" data="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=1a24a12e8ff80&p=vega4-openx-pre-roll-flp" id="embedded_player_1a24a12e8ff80"><param name="movie" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=1a24a12e8ff80&p=vega4-openx-pre-roll-flp"/><param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"/><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"/><param name="base" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com"/><param name="wmode" value="transparent"/><param name="bgcolor" value="#000000"/><param name="flashvars" value="v=1a24a12e8ff80&autoplay=false"/></object></p>
<p>Aww!  What could have been!</p>
<p>This is actually pretty sad!</p>
<p>Check out the first footage from the US version of <em><a href="http://www.perezhilton.com/category/x-factor" target="_blank">The X Factor</a></em>, which was shown to advertisers at the FOX upfronts last month, and still features <strong><a href="http://www.perezhilton.com/category/cheryl-cole" target="_blank">Cheryl Cole</a></strong> as a judge, alongside <strong><a href="http://www.perezhilton.com/category/simon-cowell" target="_blank">Simon Cowell</a></strong>, <strong><a href="http://www.perezhilton.com/category/paula-abdul" target="_blank">Paula Abdul</a></strong>, and <strong>L.A. Reid</strong> (above)!</p>
<p>Only a week after this was <a href="http://bit.ly/m71c8F" target="_blank">filmed</a>, poor Chezza was axed.</p>
<p>Which now even makes LESS sense to us, because as one can clearly hear, her accent is completely understandable, and she seems to have a lot of good input on the panel!</p>
<p>It will be very inneresting to see how they integrate this footage into the series once <strong><a href="http://www.perezhilton.com/category/nicole-scherzinger" target="_blank">Nicole Scherzinger</a></strong> takes over full time.</p>
<p>Such a shame! </p>
<p>What do U think??  Will U miss Chezza on the judges panel??
</p>
                    </div>

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-noel-gallagher-finally-marries-girlfriend-after-11-years-together"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Noel Gallagher Marries Girlfriend After 11 Years, Doesn't Invite Brother Liam To Wedding">Noel Gallagher Marries Girlfriend After 11 Years, Doesn't Invite Brother Liam To Wedding</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/anglophilia/" title="View all posts in Anglophilia" rel="category tag">Anglophilia</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/music-minute/" title="View all posts in Music Minute" rel="category tag">Music Minute</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/celebrity-feuds/" title="View all posts in Celebrity Feuds" rel="category tag">Celebrity Feuds</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/fashion-smashion/" title="View all posts in Fashion Smashion" rel="category tag">Fashion Smashion</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/love-line/" title="View all posts in Love Line" rel="category tag">Love Line</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/russell-brand/" title="View all posts in Russell Brand" rel="category tag">Russell Brand</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/events/" title="View all posts in Events" rel="category tag">Events</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image171577" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/noel-gallagher-marries-girlfriend__oPt.jpg" alt="noel gallagher marries girlfriend" /></p>
<p>You'd think she would have given him an ultimatum after like 3 years&#8230;but better late than never!</p>
<p>After 11 years in a relationship AND having two children together, <strong>Noel Gallagher</strong> and long-time girlfriend <strong>Sara MacDonald</strong> were finally married over the weekend!</p>
<p>According to reports, <a href="#readmore" id="more-popup-link-171580" onclick="perez_openPopUpPost('171580', 'http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-noel-gallagher-finally-marries-girlfriend-after-11-years-together')">Read the rest of this entry &raquo;</a>

                    </div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-noel-gallagher-finally-marries-girlfriend-after-11-years-together"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Noel Gallagher Marries Girlfriend After 11 Years, Doesn't Invite Brother Liam To Wedding">Permalink</a>

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-amanda-and-dominic-together-again-maybe"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Together Again: Amanda And Dominic Edition??">Together Again: Amanda And Dominic Edition??</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/ryan-phillippe/" title="View all posts in Ryan Phillippe" rel="category tag">Ryan Phillippe</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/love-line/" title="View all posts in Love Line" rel="category tag">Love Line</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/dominic-cooper/" title="View all posts in Dominic Cooper" rel="category tag">Dominic Cooper</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/amanda-seyfried/" title="View all posts in Amanda Seyfried" rel="category tag">Amanda Seyfried</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image171576" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/seyfrienddominiconagain__oPt.jpg" alt="Seyfried And Dominic On Again Perhaps" /></p>
<p>Would you look at that!</p>
<p>It seems like just a few weeks after her split with <strong>Ryan Philippe</strong> that <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/amanda-seyfried/" target="_blank"><strong>Amanda Seyfried</strong></a> is getting cozy again with her ex-boyfriend <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/dominic-cooper/" target="_blank"><strong>Dominic Cooper</strong></a>!</p>
<p>The two were spotted shopping at <em>Barneys</em> New York department store in West Hollywood yesterday, totally looking like an item!</p>
<p>We agree! Seems like a little somethin' somethin' might be <a href="http://bit.ly/l9kmk0" target="_blank">happening</a> again&#8230; Amanda, let us know what's up!</p>
<p>Do U think she should be getting back with Dom??</p>

</p>

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-sarah-and-bristol-palin-are-trademarking-their-names"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Sarah And Bristol Palin Are Trademarking Their Names">Sarah And Bristol Palin Are Trademarking Their Names</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/wacky/" title="View all posts in Wacky, Tacky &amp; True" rel="category tag">Wacky, Tacky &amp; True</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/politik/" title="View all posts in Politik" rel="category tag">Politik</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/sarah-palin/" title="View all posts in Sarah Palin" rel="category tag">Sarah Palin</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin/" title="View all posts in Bristol Palin" rel="category tag">Bristol Palin</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image171524" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/sarahbristoltrade__oPt.jpg" alt="Sarah And Bristol Trademark" /></p>
<p>Both <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/sarah-palin/" target="_blank"><strong>Sarah</strong></a> and <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin/" target="_blank"><strong>Bristol Palin</strong></a> have started the process of trademarking their names <del>and severely overestimating the future use of them that would make trademarking worth it</del>.</p>
<p>Sarah dropped $650 bones for her trademark, which includes: <a href="#readmore" id="more-popup-link-171517" onclick="perez_openPopUpPost('171517', 'http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-sarah-and-bristol-palin-are-trademarking-their-names')">Read the rest of this entry &raquo;</a>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">WENN</a></em>.]</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-sarah-and-bristol-palin-are-trademarking-their-names"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Sarah And Bristol Palin Are Trademarking Their Names">Permalink</a>
                                                       / <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-sarah-and-bristol-palin-are-trademarking-their-names#respond" title="Comment on Sarah And Bristol Palin Are Trademarking Their Names">15 comments</a>                        
                                                    / <a id="emailbutton_171517" href="#forward" style="cursor:pointer;" onclick="showPosseMainWindow('http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-sarah-and-bristol-palin-are-trademarking-their-names', 171517);return false;">

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-tom-hanks-dances-on-spanish-program-despierta-america-while-promoting-his-new-movie-larry-crowne"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Tom Hanks Promotes His New Movie Larry Crowne Dances On Spanish Morning Program">Tom Hanks <del>Promotes His New Movie <em>Larry Crowne</em></del> Dances On Spanish Morning Program</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/tv-news/" title="View all posts in TV News" rel="category tag">TV News</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/latinolicious/" title="View all posts in Latinolicious" rel="category tag">Latinolicious</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/film-flickers/" title="View all posts in Film Flickers" rel="category tag">Film Flickers</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/media-minute/" title="View all posts in Media Minute" rel="category tag">Media Minute</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/tom-hanks/" title="View all posts in Tom Hanks" rel="category tag">Tom Hanks</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/pereztv/" title="View all posts in PerezTV" rel="category tag">PerezTV</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" name="embedded_player_6107b43c239ed" width="410" height="308" data="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=6107b43c239ed&p=vega4-openx-pre-roll-flp" id="embedded_player_6107b43c239ed"><param name="movie" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=6107b43c239ed&p=vega4-openx-pre-roll-flp"/><param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"/><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"/><param name="base" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com"/><param name="wmode" value="transparent"/><param name="bgcolor" value="#000000"/><param name="flashvars" value="v=6107b43c239ed&autoplay=false"/></object></p>
<p>Why struggle with language barriers when you can get your message across through the universal language: DANCE!</p>
<p>Check out the video (above) of <strong><a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/tom-hanks?from=starseeker_top" target="_blank">Tom Hanks</a></strong> dancing during an appearance on Spanish morning program <em>Despierta America</em>.</p>
<p>Hopefully at SOME point he got a chance to promote his new movie <em>Larry Crowne</em> while on the show.</p>
<p>BUT even if he didn't, at least we now know that Mr. Hanks can mambo like a pro!</p>
<p>Werk it, Tom! LOLz.
</p>
                    </div>

    <div><div></div><div><h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-amber-portwood-is-going-to-rehab/?from=top-headline" title="Permanent Link to Teen Mom Amber Portwood Is Going To Rehab!"><Em>Teen Mom</em> Amber Portwood Is Going To Rehab!</a></h2><div><p><img src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/amberportwoodreleased__opt1__oPt.jpg"></p><p>
It's a sad situation, but we're proud that she is taking steps to better herself, as a person and a mother.</p>
<p>Earlier this month, Teen Mom star <strong>Amber Portwood </strong>was hospitalized after a suicide attempt. Now, before she makes her big move to California with her family, she is seeking treatment for her issues. She revealed to Star Magazine that she's entering rehab as of this week for "anger control issues and depression." She added:
</p>

        <div><a href="http://teddyhilton.com" class="fitTagLink">Home</a> &gt;&gt; <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/category/peta/" title="View all posts in PETA" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">PETA</a>,  <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/category/legal-matters/" title="View all posts in Legal Matters" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Legal Matters</a>,  <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/category/disgusting/" title="View all posts in Disgusting!" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Disgusting!</a>,  <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/category/rat/" title="View all posts in Rat" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Rat</a> &gt;&gt; <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/2011-06-22-never-eat-a-rat" class="fitTagLink" style="text-decoration: underline;">Man Charged With Eating A Live Rat</a></div>

            <div>
            
                <h1 class="fitHeadline">Man Charged With Eating A Live Rat</h1>
                
                                <small class="fitCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/category/peta/" title="View all posts in PETA" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">PETA</a>  <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/category/legal-matters/" title="View all posts in Legal Matters" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Legal Matters</a>  <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/category/disgusting/" title="View all posts in Disgusting!" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Disgusting!</a>  <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/category/rat/" title="View all posts in Rat" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Rat</a></small>
                
                <p><img id="image5851" src="http://i.teddyhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/wenn1606509__oPt.jpg" alt="Man Charged With Eating A Live Rat  " /></p>
<p>He must have been real hungry! (or stupid.)</p>
<p>A Utah man faces an animal cruelty charge after a Facebook video surfaced showing him eating what appeared to be a live baby rat.</p>
<p>Too bad for him, PETA saw his <em>Jackass</em>-like antics and informed the authorities. </p>
<p>The video shows a man putting what appears to be a tiny, hairless rat in his mouth, chewing it up and swallowing it.</p>
<p><strong>Andy Ray Harris</strong> of Tooele was charged with the misdemeanor in April after authorities viewed the <a href="http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/06/22/man-live-baby-rat_n_881976.html" target="_blank">video</a>.</p>
<p>Harris has pleaded not guilty to the <a href="http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2011/06/22/man-live-baby-rat_n_881976.html" target="_blank">charges</a>.</p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">WENN</a></em>.]
</p>
<p>Tags: <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/tag/animal_cruelty/" title="Browse for animal cruelty" rel="tag">animal cruelty</a>, <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/tag/charged/" title="Browse for charged" rel="tag">charged</a>, <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/tag/facebook/" title="Browse for facebook" rel="tag">facebook</a>, <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/tag/guilty/" title="Browse for guilty" rel="tag">guilty</a>, <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/tag/hungry/" title="Browse for hungry" rel="tag">hungry</a>, <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/tag/misdemeanor/" title="Browse for misdemeanor" rel="tag">misdemeanor</a>, <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/tag/PETA/" title="Browse for PETA" rel="tag">PETA</a>, <a href="http://teddyhilton.com/tag/video/" title="Browse for video" rel="tag">video</a></p>

            <div>
            
                <h1 class="fitHeadline">QuickFit Tip Of The Day</h1>

                                <small class="fitCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/diets/" title="View all posts in Diets" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Diets</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/food/" title="View all posts in Food" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Food</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/exclusives/" title="View all posts in Exclusives!" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Exclusives!</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/lisa-defazio/" title="View all posts in Lisa DeFazio" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Lisa DeFazio</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/quickfit-tip-of-the-day/" title="View all posts in QuickFit Tip of the Day" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">QuickFit Tip of the Day</a></small>
                
                <p><img id="image10469" src="http://i.fitperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/qftd-white_1__oPt.jpg" alt="QFTD White 1" /></p>
<p>Fiber keeps you fuller longer. Choose whole grain breads and cereals.</p>
<p>- Celebrity nutritionist <strong><a href="http://fitperez.com/category/lisa-defazio/" target="_blank">Lisa DeFazio</a></strong></p>
<p>Tags: <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/bread/" title="Browse for bread" rel="tag">bread</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/celebrity/" title="Browse for celebrity" rel="tag">celebrity</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/cereal/" title="Browse for cereal" rel="tag">cereal</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/fiber/" title="Browse for fiber" rel="tag">fiber</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/full/" title="Browse for full" rel="tag">full</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/nutrition/" title="Browse for nutrition" rel="tag">nutrition</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/nutritionist/" title="Browse for nutritionist" rel="tag">nutritionist</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/whole_grain/" title="Browse for whole grain" rel="tag">whole grain</a></p>
                                         <div>

                <div>
                                        <h1><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-21-britney-spears-looking-great-during-femme-fatale-show-in-los-angeles"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Britney Looking GREAT At Femme Fatale Show In El Lay!">Britney Looking GREAT At <em>Femme Fatale</em> Show In El Lay!</a></h1>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/music-minute/" title="View all posts in Music Minute" rel="category tag">Music Minute</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/britney-spears/" title="View all posts in Britney Spears" rel="category tag">Britney Spears</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/photos/" title="View all posts in pHOtos!" rel="category tag">pHOtos!</a></div>

                    <div><span>
                            <p><img id="image171373" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/britney-in-concert__oPt.jpg" alt="britney-in-concert.jpg" /></p>
<p>Werk it, gurl!</p>
<p>Check out the photos (above, and below) of <strong><a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/britney-spears?from=starseeker_top" target="_blank">Britney Spears</a></strong> taking it to the next level during Monday night's <em>Femme Fatale</em> concert at El Lay's Staples Center.</p>
<p>Looking fantastic, Brit!!! And great job last night! Keep it up!</p>
<p>How do U think Brit Brit's lookin'? Any Los Angeles folks out there get to see her perform?</p>

    <div>
        <span>Top Story</span>
        <a href="http://www.wenn.com/all-news" title="All News and Press" style="float: right;"><img src="http://www.wenn.com/wp-content/themes/wenn/img/news-article-controls/allnews.gif" style="float: right;" /></a>

    <div>
    	
		            <div>
                <img src='http://www.wenn.com/wp-content/files_flutter/th_f700d9aae93ebcb0097e9d20cfdd7e7a_1308758401_wenn5414332_65_2186_1.jpg' />            </div>
            			<div>
                <small style="color: #666666; font-weight: normal;">June 22, 2011&nbsp;|&nbsp;12:00pm EST </small>
				<a href="http://www.wenn.com/all-news/clooney-and-canalis-split/"><h2 style="color: #000000;">Clooney And Canalis Split</h2></a>

				<div>
                    <p>George Clooney is single again after splitting with longtime girlfriend Elisabetta Canalis.<br />
The Ocean&#8217;s Eleven star and his girlfriend released a joint statement to People.com on Wednesday, confirming the sad news.</p>
<p>It reads, &#8220;We are not together anymore. It&#8217;s very difficult and very personal, and we hope everyone can respect our privacy.&#8221;</p>
<p>The split comes just days after TV presenter and model Canalis gave a heart-warming interview&#8230;<br /><a class="readmore" href="http://www.wenn.com/all-news/clooney-and-canalis-split/"><img src="http://www.wenn.com/wp-content/themes/wenn/img/news-article-controls/readmore.png" /></a></p>
				</div>

			</div>

                <h1 class="cocoHeadline">Donatella Shows Off New Collection While Surrounding Herself With Hot Men</h1>
                <small class="cocoCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/donatella-versace/" title="View all posts in Donatella Versace" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Donatella Versace</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/chace-crawford/" title="View all posts in Chace Crawford" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Chace Crawford</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/zachary-quinto/" title="View all posts in Zachary Quinto" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Zachary Quinto</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/hm/" title="View all posts in H&amp;M" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">H&amp;M</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/ryan-kwanten/" title="View all posts in Ryan Kwanten" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Ryan Kwanten</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/versace/" title="View all posts in Versace" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Versace</a></small>
                <p><img id="image77676" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/donatella-in-hm-versace__oPt.jpg" alt="donatella-in-hm-versace.jpg" /><br />
<img id="image77675" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/1donatella-in-hm-versace__oPt.jpg" alt="1donatella-in-hm-versace.jpg" /><br />
<img id="image77674" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/2donatella-in-hm-versace__oPt.jpg" alt="2donatella-in-hm-versace.jpg" /></p>
<p>Earlier this week, <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/versace/" target="_blank">Versace</a></strong> showed off their Menâ€™s Spring/Summer 2012 collection which was influenced by <strong>Gianni</strong>, featuring a bit of an â€˜80s vibe with a modern twist. </p>
<p>Several male celebs attended such as<strong> <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/chace-crawford/" target="_blank">Chace Crawford</a>, Darren Criss, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/ryan-kwaten/" target="_blank">Ryan Kwaten</a>, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/Zachary-quinto/" target="_blank">Zachary Quinto</a>, Dwayne Wade</strong>, and <strong>Carmelo Anthony.</strong></p>
<p>And as we mentioned yesterday, it was <a href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-21-versace-designing-for-h-and-m" target="_blank">announced</a> that <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/hm/" target="_blank">H&#038;M</a></strong> and <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/donatella-versace/" target="_blank">Donatella Versace</a></strong> are collaborating on a collection this year set to launch in November.</p>
<p>Now check out Donatellaâ€™s outfit above, sheâ€™s wearing one of the new Versace/H&#038;M outfits!</p>
<p>Thus far thatâ€™s the only sample from the collection theyâ€™ve shown and weâ€™re loving it.</p>
<p>All we need now is for the prices to be fairly reasonable and itâ€™ll be a win for all.</p>

<p><strong>Stephen on meeting his costar and future wife, </strong><strong>Anna Paquin</strong>â€¦<br />
â€œI was intrigued by her. She was very open about work. But she was withdrawn [personally]. <p><strong>Stephen on persistence at the gymâ€¦<br />
</strong>â€œThereâ€™s no immediate payoff. Sometimes it feels like itâ€™s taking forever to see results. It takes commitment and time, but when you start to see resultsâ€”when you feel a bit leaner or youâ€™re doing more repsâ€”you start to think, Wow, I can see a difference! And itâ€™s palpable. I recommend it.â€</p>
<p><strong>Stephen on his true fitness personalityâ€¦<br />
</strong>â€œIâ€™m an English boy. I played a lot of sports growing up, but I never had any kind of workout regimen. My working out was with my right arm and it involved a pint glass.â€</p>
<p><strong>Stephen on having a trainerâ€¦<br />
</strong>â€œI find that I donâ€™t go at it if I donâ€™t have someone making me. Youâ€™d be amazed at how quickly I let it all go. I think half of what a trainer does is make you feel shame if you donâ€™t show up.â€</p>
<p><strong>Why Stephen goes to the gymâ€¦<br />
</strong>â€œI didnâ€™t want my kids to look back at the show in 20 yearsâ€™ time and go, â€˜Whoâ€™s that slobby git? Oh, itâ€™s you, Dad.â€™â€</p>
<p><strong>Stephen on his True Blood co-star, Ryan Kwantenâ€¦<br />
</strong>â€œ[Kwantenâ€™s character] walks into a room and takes his shirt off. Thatâ€™s his normal entrance. Ryan has minus 6 percent body fat.â€</p>
<p><strong>Stephen on the value of stillnessâ€¦<br />
</strong>â€œ[The actors] who go into the room and donâ€™t do anything are the ones who turn peopleâ€™s heads. Might not be able to act for shit, but theyâ€™re the ones people are interested in. They want enigmatic.â€  </p>

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-sarah-and-bristol-palin-are-trademarking-their-names"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Sarah And Bristol Palin Are Trademarking Their Names">Sarah And Bristol Palin Are Trademarking Their Names</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/wacky/" title="View all posts in Wacky, Tacky &amp; True" rel="category tag">Wacky, Tacky &amp; True</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/politik/" title="View all posts in Politik" rel="category tag">Politik</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/sarah-palin/" title="View all posts in Sarah Palin" rel="category tag">Sarah Palin</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin/" title="View all posts in Bristol Palin" rel="category tag">Bristol Palin</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image171524" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/sarahbristoltrade__oPt.jpg" alt="Sarah And Bristol Trademark" /></p>
<p>Both <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/sarah-palin/" target="_blank"><strong>Sarah</strong></a> and <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin/" target="_blank"><strong>Bristol Palin</strong></a> have started the process of trademarking their names <del>and severely overestimating the future use of them that would make trademarking worth it</del>.</p>
<p>Sarah dropped $650 bones for her trademark, which includes: <a href="#readmore" id="more-popup-link-171517" onclick="perez_openPopUpPost('171517', 'http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-sarah-and-bristol-palin-are-trademarking-their-names')">Read the rest of this entry &raquo;</a>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">WENN</a></em>.]</p>
                    </div>

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-21-bristol-palin-bashes-megan-mccain-and-megan-responds-via-twitter"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Bristol Palin Vs. Meghan McCain: Bristol Strikes Back!">Bristol Palin Vs. Meghan McCain: Bristol Strikes Back!</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/celebrity-feuds/" title="View all posts in Celebrity Feuds" rel="category tag">Celebrity Feuds</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/politik/" title="View all posts in Politik" rel="category tag">Politik</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/youtube/" title="View all posts in YouTube" rel="category tag">YouTube</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/john-mccain/" title="View all posts in John McCain" rel="category tag">John McCain</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/sarah-palin/" title="View all posts in Sarah Palin" rel="category tag">Sarah Palin</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/twitter/" title="View all posts in Twitter" rel="category tag">Twitter</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin/" title="View all posts in Bristol Palin" rel="category tag">Bristol Palin</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bookz/" title="View all posts in Bookz" rel="category tag">Bookz</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image171469" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/bristol-palin-vs-meghan-mccain-round-two__oPt.jpg" alt="bristol palin vs meghan mccain round two" /></p>
<p>Last we heard about dramz between these two, <strong>Meghan McCain</strong> had <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2010-11-04-meghan-mccain-slams-bristol-palin-for-not-voting-in-midterm-elections" target="_blank">slammed</a> <strong><a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin?from=starseeker_top" target="_blank">Bristol Palin</a></strong> for not voting in November's midterm elections.</p>
<p>Now, in Bristol Palin's memoir <em>Not Afraid of Life: My Journey So Far</em>, she writes about her "initial impressions" of Meghan in a less-than-flattering light: <a href="#readmore" id="more-popup-link-171463" onclick="perez_openPopUpPost('171463', 'http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-21-bristol-palin-bashes-megan-mccain-and-megan-responds-via-twitter')">Read the rest of this entry &raquo;</a>
</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-21-bristol-palin-bashes-megan-mccain-and-megan-responds-via-twitter"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Bristol Palin Vs. Meghan McCain: Bristol Strikes Back!">Permalink</a>
                                                       / <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-21-bristol-palin-bashes-megan-mccain-and-megan-responds-via-twitter#respond" title="Comment on Bristol Palin Vs. Meghan McCain: Bristol Strikes Back!">33 comments</a>                        
                                                    / <a id="emailbutton_171463" href="#forward" style="cursor:pointer;" onclick="showPosseMainWindow('http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-21-bristol-palin-bashes-megan-mccain-and-megan-responds-via-twitter', 171463);return false;">

                <div>
                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-18-bristol-palin-reveals-details-about-levi-johnston-in-new-memoir"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Bristol Palin Reveals How She Lost Her Virginity To Levi&#8230;Drunk On Wine Coolers!">Bristol Palin Reveals How She Lost Her Virginity To Levi&#8230;Drunk On Wine Coolers!</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/icky-icky-poo/" title="View all posts in Icky Icky Poo" rel="category tag">Icky Icky Poo</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/levi-johnston/" title="View all posts in Levi Johnston" rel="category tag">Levi Johnston</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin/" title="View all posts in Bristol Palin" rel="category tag">Bristol Palin</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image170916" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/bristol-palin-reveals-levi-johnston-details__oPt.jpg" alt="bristol-palin-reveals-levi-johnston-details.jpg" /></p>
<p>Oh boy.</p>
<p><strong><a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin/" target="_blank">Bristol Palin</a></strong> is leaving nothing to the imagination (well, maybe a little) in her upcoming memoir <em>Not Afraid of Life: My Journey So Far</em>.</p>
<p>Not only does she go into detail about the night she lost her virginity to <strong><a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/levi-johnston/" target="_blank">Levi Johnston</a></strong>, but she also talks about Levi's constant cheating and overall d-baggery ways.</p>
<p>Bristol says that on the night little <strong>Tripp</strong> was conceived, she was drunk on wine coolers, didn't remember what happened, and when she woke up, Levi was gone.  </p>
<p>And even though they used a condom, she still got pregnant.  And what's worse was Levi's reaction. When she told him that she was knocked up, he told her, "Better be a f**king boy."</p>
<p>What a charmer! </p>
<p>Meanwhile, she also <a href="http://bit.ly/kA6qUB" target="_blank">reveals</a> that he constantly cheated on her and he would come home druuuunk and with hickeys all over his neck.  </p>
<p>Ewww!</p>
<p>Bristol says the final straw was when Levi got another girl preggers and named the child Bentley, which was her first choice of names when naming Tripp.  </p>
<p>Good riddance!  Levi sounds like the biggest a-hole ever!  And with all these scandalous details, Bristol is sure to make big buck$$$ when this book comes out!
</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/kathy-griffin/" title="View all posts in Kathy Griffin" rel="category tag">Kathy Griffin</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin/" title="View all posts in Bristol Palin" rel="category tag">Bristol Palin</a></div>

<p>Oh thank God! We've been suffering form MAJOR withdrawls since<em> D-List</em> went off the air!</p>
<p>We need us some <del>Maggie</del> <a href="http://www.perezhilton.com/category/Kathy-Griffin/" target="_blank"><strong>Kathy Griffin</strong></a>!</p>

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-26-sarah-palin-reportedly-furious-over-bristols-relationship-with-kyle-massey"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Is Bristol Palin Dating Kyle Massey?  Reports Suggest She IS - And Sarah Is Furious!">Is Bristol Palin Dating Kyle Massey?  Reports Suggest She IS - And Sarah Is Furious!</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/reality-television/" title="View all posts in Reality Television" rel="category tag">Reality Television</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/celebrity-feuds/" title="View all posts in Celebrity Feuds" rel="category tag">Celebrity Feuds</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/politik/" title="View all posts in Politik" rel="category tag">Politik</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/sarah-palin/" title="View all posts in Sarah Palin" rel="category tag">Sarah Palin</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin/" title="View all posts in Bristol Palin" rel="category tag">Bristol Palin</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image166639" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/sarah-palin-bristol-feud__oPt.jpg" alt="sarah-palin-reportedly-furious-over-bristols-relationship-with-kyle-massey" /></p>
<p>Oh man, oh man, OH MAN!  </p>
<p>Dear lord, we don't know if these reports are true, but we are PRAYING that they are!  LOLz!</p>
<p>Amidst the news that <strong><a href="http://www.perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin" target="_blank">Bristol Palin</a></strong> and her <em>Dancing With The Stars</em> co-star, <strong>Kyle Massey</strong>, are filming a new reality show together, and speculation that <strong><a href="http://www.perezhilton.com/category/sarah-palin" target="_blank">Sarah Palin</a></strong> may have purchased $1.7 million home near her daughter in California, <em>The National Enquirer</em> is reporting that there may be a connection between the two&#8230;and it's a doozy!</p>
<p>Apparently, the former Governor of Alaska wants to keep tabs on Bristol because during her time on reality competition, she not only got into a RELATIONSHIP with the <em>That's So Raven</em> actor, but also realized that maybe she and dear ole' mom may not see eye to eye on politics!  </p>
<p>The two have been feuding over the issue of gay marriage, and according to insiders, Bristol even banned her mom from her new home, which may have prompted Sarah to look into the mansion close by!</p>
<p>A source explains:</p>
<blockquote><p>"Sarah is furious at Bristol for going so quickly from man to man.  She is doing her best to prevent Bristol's new relationship from being featured in the reality show.  Bristol told Sarah: 'Back off and let me lead my own life!' She doesn't agree with her mom's politics or her controlling ways.  Bristol is completely rebelling against her mother - now that she's experiencing life outside of Alaska and away from Sarah.  She has opened her eyes and realized how sheltered and programmed she was."
</p></blockquote>
<p>Well, we certainly hope for Bristol's sake that she IS learning about different <a href="http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-1390790/Sarah-Palin-furious-Bristols-new-Disney-Show-star-boyfriend-Kyle-Massey.html#ixzz1NNthtBkw" target="_blank">perspectives</a> and ideas, as we think all young people need to learn what works for their PERSONAL beliefs, instead of blindly listening to what they're told!</p>
<p>We think Sarah owes her daughter this time to do her own thing, especially given the sacrifices her family made in order for her to run for Vice President and follow her OWN political dreams!</p>
<p>What do U think??  Should Sarah give her daughter some space?</p>
<p>[<em>Images via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">WENN</a></em>.]
</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-26-sarah-palin-reportedly-furious-over-bristols-relationship-with-kyle-massey"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Is Bristol Palin Dating Kyle Massey?  Reports Suggest She IS - And Sarah Is Furious!">Permalink</a>
                                                       / <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-26-sarah-palin-reportedly-furious-over-bristols-relationship-with-kyle-massey#respond" title="Comment on Is Bristol Palin Dating Kyle Massey?  Reports Suggest She IS - And Sarah Is Furious!">29 comments</a>                        
                                                    / <a id="emailbutton_166637" href="#forward" style="cursor:pointer;" onclick="showPosseMainWindow('http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-26-sarah-palin-reportedly-furious-over-bristols-relationship-with-kyle-massey', 166637);return false;">

                <div>
                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-20-track-palin-got-hitched"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Track Palin Got Hitched!">Track Palin Got Hitched!</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/love-line/" title="View all posts in Love Line" rel="category tag">Love Line</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/sarah-palin/" title="View all posts in Sarah Palin" rel="category tag">Sarah Palin</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin/" title="View all posts in Bristol Palin" rel="category tag">Bristol Palin</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image165584" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/trackpalinwedding__oPt.jpg" alt="Track Palin Gots Married" /></p>
<p>The oldest of the Palins, and proud owner of a ridiculous name, <strong>Track Palin</strong>, married his high school sweetheart!</p>
<p>Track married <strong>Britta Hanson</strong>, who is 21, in what they're calling an "intimate ceremony" in Hatcher Pass, Alaska.</p>
<p>In the middle of the week!</p>
<p>Though it is not entirely uncommon for people to have impromptu and secret weddings during the middle of the week, we feel like most of those cases have very good, probably irreversible reasons as to why they're doing it. We'll go ahead and let you draw your own conclusions from our vibes <del>preggers??</del>. </p>
<p>She's just a nursing student in love with an army reservist, and here's the family's statement:</p>
<blockquote><p>"Our families couldn't be happier! These are two hard working, humble, active, studious young adults who grew up together. We're tickled that after two decades of friendship we proudly witnessed their marriage, knowing their new life together will be blessed.</p>
<p>They will have a larger wedding celebration this winter at Alaska's Alyeska Ski Resort when extended family and friends from the Lower 48 can travel north for a long ski weekend.</p>
<p>The Hanson and Palin families are ecstatic and proud that Britta and Track married in one of our favorite spots in America, spectacular Hatcher Pass, Alaska. It's a site we've all shared fun memories of skiing, snowboarding, hiking and snowmachining."</p></blockquote>
<p>Well, regardless of the motives, we hope the main one was and always will be love! Because marriage should always first and foremost be between love and love!</p>
<p>We DO extend our congratulations to Track and Britta! Here's to hoping your marriage is long and filled with happiness!</p>
<p>Again, congrats!</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-20-track-palin-got-hitched"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Track Palin Got Hitched!">Permalink</a>
                                                       / <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-20-track-palin-got-hitched#respond" title="Comment on Track Palin Got Hitched!">20 comments</a>                        
                                                    / <a id="emailbutton_165581" href="#forward" style="cursor:pointer;" onclick="showPosseMainWindow('http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-20-track-palin-got-hitched', 165581);return false;">
                                Forward this
                            </a>&nbsp;<span>&#187;</span>

                            <div>
    <span></span><span></span>
</div>
<div>
    
</div>                        
                    </div>
                </div>

                
                
                            
                <div>
                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-11-bristol-palin-confirms-she-had-plastic-surgery"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Bristol Palin Admits To Having Plastic Corrective Surgery">Bristol Palin Admits To Having <del>Plastic</del> Corrective Surgery</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/knifestyles/" title="View all posts in Knifestyles" rel="category tag">Knifestyles</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin/" title="View all posts in Bristol Palin" rel="category tag">Bristol Palin</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image163816" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/bristole-palin-possible-work-done__opt1__oPt.jpg" alt="bristole-palin-possible-work-done__opt1.jpg" /></p>
<p>We thought so!</p>
<p>Last week, everyone got in a tizzy about the new angles <a href="http://www.perezhiton.com/category/Bristol-Palin/" target="_blank"><strong>Bristol Palin</strong></a> was sporting on her face. Besides slimming down a great deal, it was obvious that some work had been done to her nose and that her jaw had been given more definition. The infamous teen mom took her sweet time responding to the "rumors," but ultimately came forward today to confirm that she did have some work done in December 2010.</p>
<p>And we're all just noticing this now? What's wrong with us???</p>
<p>Now, as you might've guessed, Bristol isn't claiming to have done this for vanity's sake. No, she's using the old tried-and-true line that she needed this surgery for medical reasons. She explains:</p>
<blockquote><p>"I had corrective jaw surgery. Yes. It improved the way I look, but this surgery was necessary for medical reasons&#8230;so my jaw and teeth could properly realign&#8230;I don't obsess over my face&#8230; [Still] I am absolutely thrilled with the results. I look older, more mature, and don't have as much of a chubby little baby face!"
</p></blockquote>
<p>We don't agree. You don't look like YOU anymore!</p>
<p>Maybe you didn't love your chubby little baby face, but it made you, when possible, somewhat endearing. Now, we can't help but look at you and wonder how much of this was done to ensure you would get your own reality show away from your mother. Oh sure, you could tell us this was for "medical reasons," but how interesting that the entire <a href="http://www.usmagazine.com/healthylifestyle/news/bristol-palin-tells-us-i-had-corrective-jaw-surgery-2011115" target="_blank">shape</a> of you face had to change just so your teeth could be straight. AND, how does your jaw affect your nose, hmm? Did you forget how you slimmed that down too?</p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">WENN</a></em>.]</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-11-bristol-palin-confirms-she-had-plastic-surgery"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Bristol Palin Admits To Having Plastic Corrective Surgery">Permalink</a>
                                                       / <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-11-bristol-palin-confirms-she-had-plastic-surgery#respond" title="Comment on Bristol Palin Admits To Having &lt;del&gt;Plastic&lt;/del&gt; Corrective Surgery">79 comments</a>                        
                                                    / <a id="emailbutton_163814" href="#forward" style="cursor:pointer;" onclick="showPosseMainWindow('http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-11-bristol-palin-confirms-she-had-plastic-surgery', 163814);return false;">
                                Forward this
                            </a>&nbsp;<span>&#187;</span>

                            <div>
    <span></span><span></span>

                <div>
                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-09-bristol-palin-and-kyle-massey-new-reality-series"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Bristol Palin's Back With A New Reality Series!">Bristol Palin's Back With A New Reality Series!</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/reality-television/" title="View all posts in Reality Television" rel="category tag">Reality Television</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/wacky/" title="View all posts in Wacky, Tacky &amp; True" rel="category tag">Wacky, Tacky &amp; True</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin/" title="View all posts in Bristol Palin" rel="category tag">Bristol Palin</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image163381" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/bristol-palin-new-reality-s__oPt.jpg" alt="bristol-palin-and-kyle-massey-new-reality-series" /></p>
<p>Oh, good!  Because one hellish show just wasn't enough!</p>
<p><strong><a href="http://www.perezhilton.com/category/bristol-palin" target="_blank">Bristol Palin</a></strong>, who may or may not have had plastic surgery on her chin, is apparently ready to show it off for the world to see on a brand new reality series alongside her <em>Dancing With The Stars</em> castmate <strong>Kyle Massey</strong>!</p>
<p>Because you're probably just as horrified and baffled by this as we were, allow us to explain.</p>
<p>The reality star will be moving in with her son, <strong>Tripp</strong>, and the <em>That's So Raven</em> actor, his brother <strong>Chris</strong>, and the group will be filmed on the BIO show working for an unnamed charity!</p>
<p>According to Executive Vice President of Programming for A&#038;E and the BIO Channel <strong>David McKillop</strong>:</p>
<blockquote><p>"Bristol is the kind of personality BIO is drawn to.  Her personal life has been playing out in the media for several years but this will be the first time she's opening up her real life, with her and son and her friends the Massey brothers."</p></blockquote>
<p>Really?  Because we're pretty sure we'd be more drawn to the <a href="http://www.people.com/people/article/0,,20479536,00.html" target="_blank">personality</a> of a toaster oven before that girl!</p>
<p>But hey!  To each his or her own, we suppose!</p>
<p>Even if it's just a cheap bizarre gimmick disguised as a docu-series!  LOLz!</p>
<p>What do U think??  Will U be tuning in?</p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">WENN</a></em>.]
</p>
                    </div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-09-bristol-palin-and-kyle-massey-new-reality-series"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Bristol Palin's Back With A New Reality Series!">Permalink</a>
                                                       / <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-09-bristol-palin-and-kyle-massey-new-reality-series#respond" title="Comment on Bristol Palin&#039;s Back With A New Reality Series!">26 comments</a>

    <div><div></div><div><h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-amber-portwood-is-going-to-rehab/?from=top-headline" title="Permanent Link to Teen Mom Amber Portwood Is Going To Rehab!"><Em>Teen Mom</em> Amber Portwood Is Going To Rehab!</a></h2><div><p><img src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/amberportwoodreleased__opt1__oPt.jpg"></p><p>
It's a sad situation, but we're proud that she is taking steps to better herself, as a person and a mother.</p>
<p>Earlier this month, Teen Mom star <strong>Amber Portwood </strong>was hospitalized after a suicide attempt. Now, before she makes her big move to California with her family, she is seeking treatment for her issues. She revealed to Star Magazine that she's entering rehab as of this week for "anger control issues and depression." She added:
</p>

                <h1 class="fitHeadline">The SECRET For Sexy Legs, Ladies!</h1>

                                <small class="fitCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/fitness/" title="View all posts in Fitness" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Fitness</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/legs/" title="View all posts in Legs" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Legs</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/exclusives/" title="View all posts in Exclusives!" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Exclusives!</a></small>
                
                <p><object class="ph_video" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" name="embedded_player_acb39ed352b69" width="410" height="308" data="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=acb39ed352b69&p=fit-without-ads-flp" id="embedded_player_acb39ed352b69">
			    <param name="movie" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=acb39ed352b69&p=fit-without-ads-flp"/>
			    <param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"/>
			    <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"/>
			    <param name="base" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com"/>
			    <param name="bgcolor" value="#000000"/>
			    <param name="wmode" value="transparent">
			    <param name="flashvars" value="v=acb39ed352b69&autoplay=false"/>
			    </object></p>
<p>Squats!  Squats!  Squat-Squat-Squats!</p>
<p>That's right!  As <strong>Scott</strong> from <a href="http://www.dynamicsofmotion.com/" target="_blank">Dynamics of Motion</a> explains above, "get more bang for your buck" and combine all of the leg exercises you do now by doing this very simple, yet effective movement.</p>
<p>Work SMARTER, not HARDER and squat!  </p>
<p>Check out the video above to learn the easy technique and why it's one of the best exercises you can do to get sexy legs and a perky butt!
</p>
<p>Tags: <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/butt/" title="Browse for butt" rel="tag">butt</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/dynamics_of_motion/" title="Browse for dynamics of motion" rel="tag">dynamics of motion</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/effective/" title="Browse for effective" rel="tag">effective</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/exercises/" title="Browse for exercises" rel="tag">exercises</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/movement/" title="Browse for movement" rel="tag">movement</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/sexy/" title="Browse for sexy" rel="tag">sexy</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/squats/" title="Browse for squats" rel="tag">squats</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/technique/" title="Browse for technique" rel="tag">technique</a>, <a href="http://fitperez.com/tag/video/" title="Browse for video" rel="tag">video</a></p>

            <div>
            
            
                <h1 class="cocoHeadline">John Galliano Testifies!</h1>
                <small class="cocoCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/legal-matters/" title="View all posts in Legal Matters" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Legal Matters</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/christian-dior/" title="View all posts in Christian Dior" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Christian Dior</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/john-galliano/" title="View all posts in John Galliano" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">John Galliano</a></small>
                <p><img id="image77678" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/john-galliano-testimony-in-anti-semitic-slur-court-case__oPt.jpg" alt="john-galliano-testimony-in-anti-semitic-slur-court-case.jpg" /></p>
<p>As expected, <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/john-galliano/" target="_blank">John Galliano</a></strong> took the stand in a Parisian courtroom on Wednesday where he is on trial for hurling anti-semitic slurs earlier this year.</p>
<p><em>GQ</em> is <a href="http://twitter.com/#!/GQfashion" target="_blank">live-tweeting</a> from the trial and this is what the fallen designer told the three judges presiding:</p>
<blockquote><p>
-He doesn't remember anything from the rant that lasted 45 minutes<br />
-He says he's a recovering addict<br />
-He started drinking because <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/christian-dior/" target="_blank">Dior</a></strong> was doing so well, but after each "high" he would crash and alcohol helped him escape<br />
-When the stock market crashed in 2008, he was under a lot of pressure and took on a lot of line extensions<br />
-He lost a friend named Stephen, who protected him<br />
-His father's death made him turn to sleeping pills because he didn't have time to mourn<br />
-He admits to being in denial<br />
-He's still in recovery, but feeling much better
</p></blockquote>
<p>Later, the "I love Hitler" video was played and Galliano took the stand for a second time to explain himself:</p>
<blockquote><p>-The words in the video aren't his views.  He sees someone who needs help and has been pushed to the edge<br />
-He's fought discrimination all his life as he's also been subjected to it<br />
-The man in the video is not the real John Galliano<br />
-He has no memory of the events and only read about them in the press</p></blockquote>
<p>The prosecution then asked how Galliano could apologize for something he never did, even though it's obviously him in the video.</p>
<p>Stay tuned&#8230;</p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">News Pictures/WENN</a></em>.]</p>
<p>Tags: <a href="http://cocoperez.com/tag/addict/" title="Browse for addict" rel="tag">addict</a>, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/tag/court/" title="Browse for court" rel="tag">court</a>, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/tag/galliano/" title="Browse for galliano" rel="tag">galliano</a>, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/tag/galliano_trial/" title="Browse for galliano trial" rel="tag">galliano trial</a>, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/tag/judge/" title="Browse for judge" rel="tag">judge</a>, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/tag/twitter/" title="Browse for twitter" rel="tag">twitter</a></p>

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-missy-elliot-explains-why-shes-been-mia-and-speaks-about-her-battle-with-graves-disease"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Missy Elliot Explains Why She's Been MIA, Speaks About Her Battle With Graves Disease">Missy Elliot Explains Why She's Been MIA, Speaks About Her Battle With Graves Disease</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/tv-news/" title="View all posts in TV News" rel="category tag">TV News</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/reality-television/" title="View all posts in Reality Television" rel="category tag">Reality Television</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/music-minute/" title="View all posts in Music Minute" rel="category tag">Music Minute</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/inspiration/" title="View all posts in Inspiration" rel="category tag">Inspiration</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/missy-elliot/" title="View all posts in Missy Elliot" rel="category tag">Missy Elliot</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/vh1/" title="View all posts in VH1" rel="category tag">VH1</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/timbaland/" title="View all posts in Timbaland" rel="category tag">Timbaland</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image171605" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/missy-elliot-explains-why-shes-been-mia__oPt.jpg" alt="missy elliot explains why shes been mia" /></p>
<p>What an inspiration!</p>
<p>Back in May, we heard that <strong><a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/missy-elliot?from=starseeker_top" target="_blank">Missy Elliot</a></strong> would be the focus of the June 29th season premiere episode of <strong><a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/vh1?from=starseeker_top" target="_blank">VH1's</a></strong> <em><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-05-24-info-on-the-new-season-of-behind-the-music" target="_blank">Behind the Music</a></em>.</p>
<p>Here's what the show's executive producer <strong>Brad Abramson</strong> said about it at the time: <a href="#readmore" id="more-popup-link-171598" onclick="perez_openPopUpPost('171598', 'http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-missy-elliot-explains-why-shes-been-mia-and-speaks-about-her-battle-with-graves-disease')">Read the rest of this entry &raquo;</a>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://rameypix.net/?module=assetserver" target="_blank">Ramey Pix</a></em>.]</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-missy-elliot-explains-why-shes-been-mia-and-speaks-about-her-battle-with-graves-disease"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Missy Elliot Explains Why She's Been MIA, Speaks About Her Battle With Graves Disease">Permalink</a>

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-aishwarya-rai-is-preggers"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Aishwarya Rai Is Preggers!">Aishwarya Rai Is Preggers!</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/baby-blabber/" title="View all posts in Baby Blabber" rel="category tag">Baby Blabber</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/love-line/" title="View all posts in Love Line" rel="category tag">Love Line</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image171532" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/raipreggers__oPt.jpg" alt="Rai Preggers" /></p>
<p><strong>Aishwarya Rai</strong>, the Bollywood star, is completely preggers right now! </p>
<p>This might not be a huge deal here in the States, but, in Bollywood this is gigantic news! She's expecting a baby with her husband (who is a Bollywood actor-producer) <strong>Abhishek Bachchan</strong>.</p>
<p>Here's a little about Rai:</p>
<blockquote><p>Rai, 37, has long been considered one of the premier actresses in Bollywood, winning two Filmfare Awards (the Hindi equivalent of the Oscars) and starring in several commercially lucrative films.</p></blockquote>
<p>Married in 2007, this is the couple's first <a href="http://wapo.st/mMaGtz" target="_blank">child</a>! </p>
<p>Congrats, guys! </p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">WENN</a></em>.]
</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-aishwarya-rai-is-preggers"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Aishwarya Rai Is Preggers!">Permalink</a>
                                                       / <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-aishwarya-rai-is-preggers#respond" title="Comment on Aishwarya Rai Is Preggers!">8 comments</a>

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-keira-knightley-love-quote"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Quote of the Day">Quote of the Day</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/quote-of-the-day/" title="View all posts in Quote of the Day" rel="category tag">Quote of the Day</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/love-line/" title="View all posts in Love Line" rel="category tag">Love Line</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/keira-knightley/" title="View all posts in Keira Knightley" rel="category tag">Keira Knightley</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image171526" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/keria-knightly-love__oPt.jpg" alt="keria-knightly-love.jpg" /></p>
<p>"Itâ€™s difficult to be in love because your expectations are so high. But I believe in love and romance very deeply. I think that as you learn more about yourself, you also learn to be more caring and vulnerable to the man you love."</p>
<p>- <a href="http://www.perezhilton.com/category/Keira-Knightly/" target="_blank"><strong>Keira Knightly</strong></a> on love to UK's <em>OK <a href="http://bit.ly/lQrkV4 " target="_blank">Magazine</a></em></p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">WENN</a></em>.]</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                <div>
                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-jimmy-henchman-arrested-cocaine-drug-bust"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Hip-Hop Exec "Jimmy Henchman" Arrested For Tupac's Death Cocaine Trafficking">Hip-Hop Exec "Jimmy Henchman" Arrested For <del>Tupac's Death</del> Cocaine Trafficking</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/drugs/" title="View all posts in Drugs" rel="category tag">Drugs</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/music-minute/" title="View all posts in Music Minute" rel="category tag">Music Minute</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/legal-matters/" title="View all posts in Legal Matters" rel="category tag">Legal Matters</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><img id="image171531" src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/jimmy-henchman-rosemond-mugshot__oPt.jpg" alt="jimmy-henchman-rosemond-mugshot.jpg" /></p>
<p>You can't outrun the law forever - especially when you can be found in high profile places like the W Hotel!</p>
<p>Talent manager <strong>James "Jimmy Henchman" Rosemond </strong>was arrest yesterday in New York and charged with cocaine trafficking. Jimmy Henchman is most notably the man <strong>Dexter Isaac </strong>accused of  orchestrating the 1994 shooting of<strong> Tupac Shakur</strong>, but more recently, Jimmy has has a month long warrant out for his arrest for running a cocaine trafficking operation.</p>
<p>The police nabbed Jimmy coming out of the W Hotel in Union Square and was promptly arraigned in Brooklyn on conspiracy to distribute in excess of five kilograms of cocaine. He is currently being held without <a href="http://on.mtv.com/kvpecb " target="_blank">bail</a>.</p>
<p>He's got a lot to answer for! Our bet is he's not going ANYWHERE, anytime soon!
</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-jimmy-henchman-arrested-cocaine-drug-bust"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Hip-Hop Exec "Jimmy Henchman" Arrested For Tupac's Death Cocaine Trafficking">Permalink</a>
                                                       / <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-jimmy-henchman-arrested-cocaine-drug-bust#respond" title="Comment on Hip-Hop Exec &quot;Jimmy Henchman&quot; Arrested For &lt;del&gt;Tupac&#039;s Death&lt;/del&gt; Cocaine Trafficking">2 comments</a>                        
                                                    / <a id="emailbutton_171530" href="#forward" style="cursor:pointer;" onclick="showPosseMainWindow('http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-jimmy-henchman-arrested-cocaine-drug-bust', 171530);return false;">

                                        <h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-bam-margera-grieves-at-ryan-dunn-crash-site"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Bam Margera Grieves At Ryan Dunn Crash Site">Bam Margera Grieves At Ryan Dunn Crash Site</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/rip/" title="View all posts in R.I.P." rel="category tag">R.I.P.</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bam-margera/" title="View all posts in Bam Margera" rel="category tag">Bam Margera</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/sad-sad/" title="View all posts in Sad Sad" rel="category tag">Sad Sad</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/pereztv/" title="View all posts in PerezTV" rel="category tag">PerezTV</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" name="embedded_player_f2bf35369b55f" width="410" height="308" data="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=f2bf35369b55f&p=vega4-openx-pre-roll-flp" id="embedded_player_f2bf35369b55f"><param name="movie" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=f2bf35369b55f&p=vega4-openx-pre-roll-flp"/><param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"/><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"/><param name="base" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com"/><param name="wmode" value="transparent"/><param name="bgcolor" value="#000000"/><param name="flashvars" value="v=f2bf35369b55f&autoplay=false"/></object></p>
<p>After all the years they spent side-by-side, we can't begin to imagine what Bam's going through right now.</p>
<p>Check out the video (above) of <strong><a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/bam-margera?from=starseeker_top" target="_blank">Bam Margera</a></strong> struggling to keep himself together at the site of <strong>Ryan Dunn's</strong> fatal car crash.</p>
<p>Such an incredibly sad, tragic situation. Our thoughts are with you, Bam, and they also continue to go out to Ryan's family, friends, and peers.</p>
<p>Stay strong!
</p>
                    </div>

                    
                    <div>

                        <a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-bam-margera-grieves-at-ryan-dunn-crash-site"  rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Bam Margera Grieves At Ryan Dunn Crash Site">Permalink</a>

                                        <h2><a href="http://fitperez.com/2011-06-22-man-robs-1-from-banks-to-get-prison-health-care/?from=PH"  target="_blank" rel="bookmark" title="Permanent Link to Man Robs $1 From Banks To Get Prison Health Care">Man Robs $1 From Banks To Get Prison Health Care</a></h2>
                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/health/?from=PH" target="_blank">Health</a> > <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/wacky-tacky-true/?from=PH" target="_blank">Wacky Tacky &amp; True</a></div>

                    <div>
                        <p><a href="http://fitperez.com/2011-06-22-man-robs-1-from-banks-to-get-prison-health-care/?from=PH" target="_blank"><img src="http://i.fitperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/web-heatlhcare-arrest-spl__oPt.jpg" align="left" class="import"></a>
This is a sad demonstration of what&#39;s wrong in the US right now.</p>
<p>A man in North Carolina, <strong>Richard James Verone</strong>, was so desperate for medical treatment that he robbed a bank for one dollar.</p>
<p>Richard didn&#39;t make a big scene as he calmly walked into the RBC Bank in Gastonia, North Carolina and handed the teller a note demanding money and informing him that he had a gun.</p>
<p>Said Richard:
</p>
<p><a href="http://fitperez.com/2011-06-22-man-robs-1-from-banks-to-get-prison-health-care/?from=PH" target="_blank">Read More on <img src="http://img.perezhilton.com/images/read_more_on_fitperez_small.png" style="border: none;" align="absmiddle" hspace="0" vspace="0"></a></p><br clear="all">                    </div>

                    <div>Filed under: <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/neyo/" title="View all posts in NeYo" rel="category tag">NeYo</a> >  <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/pitbull/" title="View all posts in Pitbull" rel="category tag">Pitbull</a></div>

                        <p><object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" name="embedded_player_37401110a3e07" width="410" height="308" data="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=37401110a3e07&p=vega4-openx-pre-roll-flp" id="embedded_player_37401110a3e07"><param name="movie" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=37401110a3e07&p=vega4-openx-pre-roll-flp"/><param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"/><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"/><param name="base" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com"/><param name="wmode" value="transparent"/><param name="bgcolor" value="#000000"/><param name="flashvars" value="v=37401110a3e07&autoplay=false"/></object></p>
