    <div><div></div><div><h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-amber-portwood-is-going-to-rehab/?from=top-headline" title="Permanent Link to Teen Mom Amber Portwood Is Going To Rehab!"><Em>Teen Mom</em> Amber Portwood Is Going To Rehab!</a></h2><div><p><img src="http://img.perezhilton.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/amberportwoodreleased__opt1__oPt.jpg"></p><p>
It's a sad situation, but we're proud that she is taking steps to better herself, as a person and a mother.</p>
<p>Earlier this month, Teen Mom star <strong>Amber Portwood </strong>was hospitalized after a suicide attempt. Now, before she makes her big move to California with her family, she is seeking treatment for her issues. She revealed to Star Magazine that she's entering rehab as of this week for "anger control issues and depression." She added:
</p>

            <div>
            
            
                <h1 class="cocoHeadline">Olivia Palermo Shifts Into Summer</h1>
                <small class="cocoCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/victoria-beckham/" title="View all posts in Victoria Beckham" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Victoria Beckham</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/fashion-smashion/" title="View all posts in Fashion Smashion" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Fashion Smashion</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/olivia-palermo/" title="View all posts in Olivia Palermo" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Olivia Palermo</a></small>
                <p><img id="image77681" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/olivia-palermo-in-victoria-beckham-collection-the-ledge-screening__oPt.jpg" alt="olivia-palermo-in-victoria-beckham-collection-the-ledge-screening.jpg" /></p>
<p><strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/olivia-palermo/" target="_blank">Olivia Palermo</a></strong> greeted the first day of summer with open arms on Tuesday evening.</p>
<p>The new face of <strong>Tibi</strong> was hard to miss at the screening of <em>The Ledge</em> in a mandarin-colored <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/victoria-beckham/" target="_blank">Victoria Beckham Collection</a></strong> shift dress and <strong>Charlotte Olympia</strong> leopard print heels.</p>
<p>Very chic!</p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">L Gallo/WENN</a></em>.]</p>
<p>Tags: <a href="http://cocoperez.com/tag/charlotte_olympia/" title="Browse for charlotte olympia" rel="tag">charlotte olympia</a>, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/tag/screening/" title="Browse for screening" rel="tag">screening</a>, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/tag/the_ledge/" title="Browse for the ledge" rel="tag">the ledge</a>, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/tag/victoria_beckham_collection_spring_2011/" title="Browse for victoria beckham collection spring 2011" rel="tag">victoria beckham collection spring 2011</a></p>
                                         <div>
                     <p></p><ul id="relatedStoriesList" class="relatedStoriesSection"><li id="relatedStoriesListElement"><a class="relatedStoriesLink" href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-22-charlotte-ronson-paris-hilton-nicky-hilton-ashlee-simpson-i-heart-ronson-jcpenney-collection-party?relate=">Paris, Nicky & Ashlee Heart Charlotte Ronson</a></li><li id="relatedStoriesListElement"><a class="relatedStoriesLink" href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-22-banana-republic-launching-mad-men-collection?relate=">Banana Republic's Going <em>Mad</em> For Fall</a></li><li id="relatedStoriesListElement"><a class="relatedStoriesLink" href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-22-evan-rachel-wood-in-dolce-and-gabbana-true-blood-season-4-premiere?relate=">Evan Rachel Wood Goes Short</a></li><li id="relatedStoriesListElement"><a class="relatedStoriesLink" href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-22-kate-winslet-in-victoria-beckham-collection-yo-dona-magazine-international-awards-2011?relate=">Kate Winslet Wears It Like Beckham</a></li><li id="relatedStoriesListElement"><a class="relatedStoriesLink" href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-22-tom-hanks-wears-man-spanx-in-larry-crowne?relate=">Hanks Wears Spanx</a></li></ul>                 </div>

        <div>
            
		<h2 class="fitHeadline"><a href="http://fitperez.com/2011-06-22-quick-fit-tip-of-the-day-fiber" >QuickFit Tip Of The Day</a></h2>
                            <small class="fitCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/diets/" title="View all posts in Diets" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Diets</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/food/" title="View all posts in Food" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Food</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/exclusives/" title="View all posts in Exclusives!" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Exclusives!</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/lisa-defazio/" title="View all posts in Lisa DeFazio" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Lisa DeFazio</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/quickfit-tip-of-the-day/" title="View all posts in QuickFit Tip of the Day" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">QuickFit Tip of the Day</a></small>
            
			<p><img id="image10469" src="http://i.fitperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/qftd-white_1__oPt.jpg" alt="QFTD White 1" /></p>
<p>Fiber keeps you fuller longer. Choose whole grain breads and cereals.</p>
<p>- Celebrity nutritionist <strong><a href="http://fitperez.com/category/lisa-defazio/" target="_blank">Lisa DeFazio</a></strong></p>

		<h2 class="fitHeadline"><a href="http://fitperez.com/2011-06-22-work-smarter-not-harder-squats" >The SECRET For Sexy Legs, Ladies!</a></h2>
                            <small class="fitCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/fitness/" title="View all posts in Fitness" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Fitness</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/legs/" title="View all posts in Legs" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Legs</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/exclusives/" title="View all posts in Exclusives!" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Exclusives!</a></small>
            
			<p><object class="ph_video" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" name="embedded_player_acb39ed352b69" width="410" height="308" data="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=acb39ed352b69&p=fit-without-ads-flp" id="embedded_player_acb39ed352b69">
			    <param name="movie" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=acb39ed352b69&p=fit-without-ads-flp"/>

			    <param name="flashvars" value="v=acb39ed352b69&autoplay=false"/>
			    </object></p>
<p>Squats!  Squats!  Squat-Squat-Squats!</p>
<p>That's right!  As <strong>Scott</strong> from <a href="http://www.dynamicsofmotion.com/" target="_blank">Dynamics of Motion</a> explains above, "get more bang for your buck" and combine all of the leg exercises you do now by doing this very simple, yet effective movement.</p>
<p>Work SMARTER, not HARDER and squat!  </p>
<p>Check out the video above to learn the easy technique and why it's one of the best exercises you can do to get sexy legs and a perky butt!

		<h2 class="fitHeadline"><a href="http://fitperez.com/2011-06-22-ashley-hebert-bikini-cover" >How <em>The Bachelorette</em> Lost 10 Pounds To Look This Good</a></h2>
                            <small class="fitCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/fitness/" title="View all posts in Fitness" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Fitness</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/bikini/" title="View all posts in Bikini" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Bikini</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/reality-television/" title="View all posts in Reality Television" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Reality Television</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/body/" title="View all posts in Body" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Body</a></small>
            
			<p><img id="image10464" src="http://i.fitperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/red-bikini__oPt.jpg" alt="Ashley Hebert red bikini" /></p>
<p>This season's <em>Bachelorette</em>, <strong>Ashley Hebert</strong>, looks FANTASTIC on the cover of the most recent issue of <em>Life &#038; Style Magazine</em>.  </p>
<p>However, the reality romantic revealed she had to do some work to get her body into the great shape that it is now, ESPECIALLY after having her heart broken by <strong>Brad Womack</strong> in last season of <em>The Bachelor</em>.</p>
<p>She revealed she put on 10 pounds after some serious emotional eating, admitting: </p>
<blockquote><p>â€œI was eating everything in sight.  When youâ€™re stressed out, you kind of just throw it back.â€ </p></blockquote>
<p>To gear up for her turn as the ABC heartbreaker, she turned to a healthy, balanced diet and lots of exercising, saying:</p>
<blockquote><p>â€œI donâ€™t drink as much, and I donâ€™t eat as many desserts as last time.  Now itâ€™s fruits, vegetaÂ­bles, salads and chicken â€” staying healthy&#8230;I teach dance classes â€” jazz and hip-hop â€” so I get a good mix of exercise typesâ€</p></blockquote>
<p>She also takes advantage of <a href="http://www.lifeandstylemag.com/" target="_blank">combining</a> weights and aerobics in Bodypump classes, which can burn up to 600 calories in an hour!  </p>
<p>As you can see above, all of her hard work has DEFINITELY paid off and Ashley knows it too!  In her interview for the magazine, she shared, "Itâ€™s a new, enlightened me. Iâ€™m happy. Iâ€™m in such a great place right now!â€ </p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.lifeandstylemag.com/" target="_blank">Life &#038; Style Weekly</a></em>.]
</p>

        <div>
            
		<h2 class="cocoHeadline"><a href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-22-donatella-shows-off-new-collection-while-surrounding-herself-with-hot-men" >Donatella Shows Off New Collection While Surrounding Herself With Hot Men</a></h2>
                            <small class="cocoCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/donatella-versace/" title="View all posts in Donatella Versace" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Donatella Versace</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/chace-crawford/" title="View all posts in Chace Crawford" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Chace Crawford</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/zachary-quinto/" title="View all posts in Zachary Quinto" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Zachary Quinto</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/hm/" title="View all posts in H&amp;M" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">H&amp;M</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/ryan-kwanten/" title="View all posts in Ryan Kwanten" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Ryan Kwanten</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/versace/" title="View all posts in Versace" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Versace</a></small>
            
            <p><img id="image77676" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/donatella-in-hm-versace__oPt.jpg" alt="donatella-in-hm-versace.jpg" /><br />
<img id="image77675" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/1donatella-in-hm-versace__oPt.jpg" alt="1donatella-in-hm-versace.jpg" /><br />
<img id="image77674" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/2donatella-in-hm-versace__oPt.jpg" alt="2donatella-in-hm-versace.jpg" /></p>
<p>Earlier this week, <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/versace/" target="_blank">Versace</a></strong> showed off their Menâ€™s Spring/Summer 2012 collection which was influenced by <strong>Gianni</strong>, featuring a bit of an â€˜80s vibe with a modern twist. </p>
<p>Several male celebs attended such as<strong> <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/chace-crawford/" target="_blank">Chace Crawford</a>, Darren Criss, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/ryan-kwaten/" target="_blank">Ryan Kwaten</a>, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/Zachary-quinto/" target="_blank">Zachary Quinto</a>, Dwayne Wade</strong>, and <strong>Carmelo Anthony.</strong></p>
<p>And as we mentioned yesterday, it was <a href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-21-versace-designing-for-h-and-m" target="_blank">announced</a> that <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/hm/" target="_blank">H&#038;M</a></strong> and <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/donatella-versace/" target="_blank">Donatella Versace</a></strong> are collaborating on a collection this year set to launch in November.</p>
<p>Now check out Donatellaâ€™s outfit above, sheâ€™s wearing one of the new Versace/H&#038;M outfits!</p>
<p>Thus far thatâ€™s the only sample from the collection theyâ€™ve shown and weâ€™re loving it.</p>
<p>All we need now is for the prices to be fairly reasonable and itâ€™ll be a win for all.</p>
<p>[<em>Images courtesy of Versace</em>]</p>

		<h2 class="cocoHeadline"><a href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-22-olivia-palermo-in-victoria-beckham-collection-the-ledge-nyc-screening" >Olivia Palermo Shifts Into Summer</a></h2>
                            <small class="cocoCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/victoria-beckham/" title="View all posts in Victoria Beckham" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Victoria Beckham</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/fashion-smashion/" title="View all posts in Fashion Smashion" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Fashion Smashion</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/olivia-palermo/" title="View all posts in Olivia Palermo" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Olivia Palermo</a></small>
            
            <p><img id="image77681" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/olivia-palermo-in-victoria-beckham-collection-the-ledge-screening__oPt.jpg" alt="olivia-palermo-in-victoria-beckham-collection-the-ledge-screening.jpg" /></p>
<p><strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/olivia-palermo/" target="_blank">Olivia Palermo</a></strong> greeted the first day of summer with open arms on Tuesday evening.</p>
<p>The new face of <strong>Tibi</strong> was hard to miss at the screening of <em>The Ledge</em> in a mandarin-colored <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/victoria-beckham/" target="_blank">Victoria Beckham Collection</a></strong> shift dress and <strong>Charlotte Olympia</strong> leopard print heels.</p>
<p>Very chic!</p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">L Gallo/WENN</a></em>.]</p>

		<h2 class="cocoHeadline"><a href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-22-john-galliano-testifies-in-anti-semitic-rant-case" >John Galliano Testifies!</a></h2>
                            <small class="cocoCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/legal-matters/" title="View all posts in Legal Matters" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Legal Matters</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/christian-dior/" title="View all posts in Christian Dior" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Christian Dior</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/john-galliano/" title="View all posts in John Galliano" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">John Galliano</a></small>
            
            <p><img id="image77678" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/john-galliano-testimony-in-anti-semitic-slur-court-case__oPt.jpg" alt="john-galliano-testimony-in-anti-semitic-slur-court-case.jpg" /></p>
<p>As expected, <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/john-galliano/" target="_blank">John Galliano</a></strong> took the stand in a Parisian courtroom on Wednesday where he is on trial for hurling anti-semitic slurs earlier this year.</p>
<p><em>GQ</em> is <a href="http://twitter.com/#!/GQfashion" target="_blank">live-tweeting</a> from the trial and this is what the fallen designer told the three judges presiding:</p>
<blockquote><p>
-He doesn't remember anything from the rant that lasted 45 minutes<br />
-He says he's a recovering addict<br />
-He started drinking because <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/christian-dior/" target="_blank">Dior</a></strong> was doing so well, but after each "high" he would crash and alcohol helped him escape<br />
-When the stock market crashed in 2008, he was under a lot of pressure and took on a lot of line extensions<br />
-He lost a friend named Stephen, who protected him<br />
-His father's death made him turn to sleeping pills because he didn't have time to mourn<br />
-He admits to being in denial<br />
-He's still in recovery, but feeling much better
</p></blockquote>
<p>Later, the "I love Hitler" video was played and Galliano took the stand for a second time to explain himself:</p>
<blockquote><p>-The words in the video aren't his views.  He sees someone who needs help and has been pushed to the edge<br />
-He's fought discrimination all his life as he's also been subjected to it<br />
-The man in the video is not the real John Galliano<br />
-He has no memory of the events and only read about them in the press</p></blockquote>
<p>The prosecution then asked how Galliano could apologize for something he never did, even though it's obviously him in the video.</p>
<p>Stay tuned&#8230;</p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">News Pictures/WENN</a></em>.]</p>

		<h2 class="fitHeadline"><a href="http://fitperez.com/2011-06-22-quick-fit-tip-of-the-day-fiber" >QuickFit Tip Of The Day</a></h2>
                            <small class="fitCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/diets/" title="View all posts in Diets" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Diets</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/food/" title="View all posts in Food" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Food</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/exclusives/" title="View all posts in Exclusives!" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Exclusives!</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/lisa-defazio/" title="View all posts in Lisa DeFazio" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Lisa DeFazio</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/quickfit-tip-of-the-day/" title="View all posts in QuickFit Tip of the Day" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">QuickFit Tip of the Day</a></small>
            
			<p><img id="image10469" src="http://i.fitperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/qftd-white_1__oPt.jpg" alt="QFTD White 1" /></p>
<p>Fiber keeps you fuller longer. Choose whole grain breads and cereals.</p>
<p>- Celebrity nutritionist <strong><a href="http://fitperez.com/category/lisa-defazio/" target="_blank">Lisa DeFazio</a></strong></p>

		<h2 class="fitHeadline"><a href="http://fitperez.com/2011-06-22-ashley-hebert-bikini-cover" >How <em>The Bachelorette</em> Lost 10 Pounds To Look This Good</a></h2>
                            <small class="fitCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/fitness/" title="View all posts in Fitness" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Fitness</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/bikini/" title="View all posts in Bikini" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Bikini</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/reality-television/" title="View all posts in Reality Television" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Reality Television</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/body/" title="View all posts in Body" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Body</a></small>
            
			<p><img id="image10464" src="http://i.fitperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/red-bikini__oPt.jpg" alt="Ashley Hebert red bikini" /></p>
<p>This season's <em>Bachelorette</em>, <strong>Ashley Hebert</strong>, looks FANTASTIC on the cover of the most recent issue of <em>Life &#038; Style Magazine</em>.  </p>
<p>However, the reality romantic revealed she had to do some work to get her body into the great shape that it is now, ESPECIALLY after having her heart broken by <strong>Brad Womack</strong> in last season of <em>The Bachelor</em>.</p>
<p>She revealed she put on 10 pounds after some serious emotional eating, admitting: </p>
<blockquote><p>â€œI was eating everything in sight.  When youâ€™re stressed out, you kind of just throw it back.â€ </p></blockquote>
<p>To gear up for her turn as the ABC heartbreaker, she turned to a healthy, balanced diet and lots of exercising, saying:</p>
<blockquote><p>â€œI donâ€™t drink as much, and I donâ€™t eat as many desserts as last time.  Now itâ€™s fruits, vegetaÂ­bles, salads and chicken â€” staying healthy&#8230;I teach dance classes â€” jazz and hip-hop â€” so I get a good mix of exercise typesâ€</p></blockquote>
<p>She also takes advantage of <a href="http://www.lifeandstylemag.com/" target="_blank">combining</a> weights and aerobics in Bodypump classes, which can burn up to 600 calories in an hour!  </p>
<p>As you can see above, all of her hard work has DEFINITELY paid off and Ashley knows it too!  In her interview for the magazine, she shared, "Itâ€™s a new, enlightened me. Iâ€™m happy. Iâ€™m in such a great place right now!â€ </p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.lifeandstylemag.com/" target="_blank">Life &#038; Style Weekly</a></em>.]
</p>

        <div>
            
		<h2 class="fitHeadline"><a href="http://fitperez.com/2011-06-22-diana-ross-watches-wimbledon-with-son" >Diana Ross Watches Wimbledon With Son</a></h2>
                            <small class="fitCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/sports/" title="View all posts in Sports" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Sports</a>  <a href="http://fitperez.com/category/tennis/" title="View all posts in Tennis" class="fitTagLink" rel="category tag">Tennis</a></small>
            
			<p><img id="image10462" src="http://i.fitperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/web-diana-ross-wimbledon__oPt.jpg" alt="Diana Ross Watches Wimbledon With Son " /></p>
<p>Nothinâ€™ like spending a little quality time with mom!</p>
<p><strong>Diana Ross</strong> and her son <strong>Evan</strong> watched Day 2 of the Wimbledon Tennis Championships from the Royal Box at center court.</p>
<p>Yeah, Diana Ross is royalty. Deal with it!</p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.abacausa.com" target="_blank">Abaca USA</a></em>.]</p>

    <div><div></div><div><h2><a href="http://perezhilton.com/2011-06-22-anderson-cooper-calls-out-obama-on-gay-marriage-flip-flop/?from=top-headline" title="Permanent Link to Anderson Cooper Calls Out Obama On Gay Marriage Flip Flop">Anderson Cooper Calls Out Obama On Gay Marriage Flip Flop</a></h2><div><p><object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" name="embedded_player_fda12c8fbbfec"  data="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=fda12c8fbbfec&p=vega4-openx-pre-roll-flp" id="embedded_player_fda12c8fbbfec">
<param name="movie" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com/plugins/player.swf?v=fda12c8fbbfec&p=vega4-openx-pre-roll-flp"/>
<param name="allowfullscreen" value="true"/>
<param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"/>
<param name="base" value="http://vids.perezhilton.com"/>
<param name="wmode" value="transparent"/>
<param name="bgcolor" value="#000000"/>
<param name="flashvars" value="v=fda12c8fbbfec&autoplay=false"/></object></p>
<p>And rightly so. It's sometimes bizarre how the Silver Fox ends up saying things that we're all thinking!</p>
<p><a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/anderson-cooper/" target="_blank"><strong>Anderson Cooper</strong></a> took some time on his show recently to talk to a few people about <a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/barack-obama/" target="_blank"><strong>Obama</strong></a>'s apparent flip flopping on the issues of gay marriage, and how it's obviously more politically motivated than it is personal. </p>
<p>He brings up a good point about Obama's claim that

&raquo;</a></p><p></p></div></div></div><div><div></div><div><div><a href="http://perezhilton.com/category/justin-timberlake/?from=topceleb"><img 		<h2 class="cocoHeadline"><a href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-22-donatella-shows-off-new-collection-while-surrounding-herself-with-hot-men" >Donatella Shows Off New Collection While Surrounding Herself With Hot Men</a></h2>
                            <small class="cocoCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/donatella-versace/" title="View all posts in Donatella Versace" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Donatella Versace</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/chace-crawford/" title="View all posts in Chace Crawford" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Chace Crawford</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/zachary-quinto/" title="View all posts in Zachary Quinto" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Zachary Quinto</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/hm/" title="View all posts in H&amp;M" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">H&amp;M</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/ryan-kwanten/" title="View all posts in Ryan Kwanten" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Ryan Kwanten</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/versace/" title="View all posts in Versace" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Versace</a></small>
            
            <p><img id="image77676" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/donatella-in-hm-versace__oPt.jpg" alt="donatella-in-hm-versace.jpg" /><br />
<img id="image77675" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/1donatella-in-hm-versace__oPt.jpg" alt="1donatella-in-hm-versace.jpg" /><br />
<img id="image77674" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/2donatella-in-hm-versace__oPt.jpg" alt="2donatella-in-hm-versace.jpg" /></p>
<p>Earlier this week, <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/versace/" target="_blank">Versace</a></strong> showed off their Menâ€™s Spring/Summer 2012 collection which was influenced by <strong>Gianni</strong>, featuring a bit of an â€˜80s vibe with a modern twist. </p>
<p>Several male celebs attended such as<strong> <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/chace-crawford/" target="_blank">Chace Crawford</a>, Darren Criss, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/ryan-kwaten/" target="_blank">Ryan Kwaten</a>, <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/Zachary-quinto/" target="_blank">Zachary Quinto</a>, Dwayne Wade</strong>, and <strong>Carmelo Anthony.</strong></p>
<p>And as we mentioned yesterday, it was <a href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-21-versace-designing-for-h-and-m" target="_blank">announced</a> that <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/hm/" target="_blank">H&#038;M</a></strong> and <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/donatella-versace/" target="_blank">Donatella Versace</a></strong> are collaborating on a collection this year set to launch in November.</p>
<p>Now check out Donatellaâ€™s outfit above, sheâ€™s wearing one of the new Versace/H&#038;M outfits!</p>
<p>Thus far thatâ€™s the only sample from the collection theyâ€™ve shown and weâ€™re loving it.</p>
<p>All we need now is for the prices to be fairly reasonable and itâ€™ll be a win for all.</p>
<p>[<em>Images courtesy of Versace</em>]</p>

		<h2 class="cocoHeadline"><a href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-22-olivia-palermo-in-victoria-beckham-collection-the-ledge-nyc-screening" >Olivia Palermo Shifts Into Summer</a></h2>
                            <small class="cocoCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/victoria-beckham/" title="View all posts in Victoria Beckham" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Victoria Beckham</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/fashion-smashion/" title="View all posts in Fashion Smashion" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Fashion Smashion</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/olivia-palermo/" title="View all posts in Olivia Palermo" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Olivia Palermo</a></small>
            
            <p><img id="image77681" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/olivia-palermo-in-victoria-beckham-collection-the-ledge-screening__oPt.jpg" alt="olivia-palermo-in-victoria-beckham-collection-the-ledge-screening.jpg" /></p>
<p><strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/olivia-palermo/" target="_blank">Olivia Palermo</a></strong> greeted the first day of summer with open arms on Tuesday evening.</p>
<p>The new face of <strong>Tibi</strong> was hard to miss at the screening of <em>The Ledge</em> in a mandarin-colored <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/victoria-beckham/" target="_blank">Victoria Beckham Collection</a></strong> shift dress and <strong>Charlotte Olympia</strong> leopard print heels.</p>
<p>Very chic!</p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">L Gallo/WENN</a></em>.]</p>

		<h2 class="cocoHeadline"><a href="http://cocoperez.com/2011-06-22-john-galliano-testifies-in-anti-semitic-rant-case" >John Galliano Testifies!</a></h2>
                            <small class="cocoCategories"><span>Filed Under:</span> <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/legal-matters/" title="View all posts in Legal Matters" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Legal Matters</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/christian-dior/" title="View all posts in Christian Dior" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">Christian Dior</a>  <a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/john-galliano/" title="View all posts in John Galliano" rel="category tag" class="cocoTagLink">John Galliano</a></small>
            
            <p><img id="image77678" src="http://i.cocoperez.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/john-galliano-testimony-in-anti-semitic-slur-court-case__oPt.jpg" alt="john-galliano-testimony-in-anti-semitic-slur-court-case.jpg" /></p>
<p>As expected, <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/john-galliano/" target="_blank">John Galliano</a></strong> took the stand in a Parisian courtroom on Wednesday where he is on trial for hurling anti-semitic slurs earlier this year.</p>
<p><em>GQ</em> is <a href="http://twitter.com/#!/GQfashion" target="_blank">live-tweeting</a> from the trial and this is what the fallen designer told the three judges presiding:</p>
<blockquote><p>
-He doesn't remember anything from the rant that lasted 45 minutes<br />
-He says he's a recovering addict<br />
-He started drinking because <strong><a href="http://cocoperez.com/category/christian-dior/" target="_blank">Dior</a></strong> was doing so well, but after each "high" he would crash and alcohol helped him escape<br />
-When the stock market crashed in 2008, he was under a lot of pressure and took on a lot of line extensions<br />
-He lost a friend named Stephen, who protected him<br />
-His father's death made him turn to sleeping pills because he didn't have time to mourn<br />
-He admits to being in denial<br />
-He's still in recovery, but feeling much better
</p></blockquote>
<p>Later, the "I love Hitler" video was played and Galliano took the stand for a second time to explain himself:</p>
<blockquote><p>-The words in the video aren't his views.  He sees someone who needs help and has been pushed to the edge<br />
-He's fought discrimination all his life as he's also been subjected to it<br />
-The man in the video is not the real John Galliano<br />
-He has no memory of the events and only read about them in the press</p></blockquote>
<p>The prosecution then asked how Galliano could apologize for something he never did, even though it's obviously him in the video.</p>
<p>Stay tuned&#8230;</p>
<p>[<em>Image via <a href="http://www.wenn.com" target="_blank">News Pictures/WENN</a></em>.]</p>
